original_text: You have been fighting against sin in your lives. But you have not yet had to fight like that until someone killed you.
korean_text: 너희가 죄와 싸우되 아직 피흘리기까지는 대항하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: You have been fighting against sin in your lives.
But you have not yet had to fight like that
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 아직 그렇게 싸울 필요가 없었다.
